name: Press Ent
description:
Controls: Look at the title ;)

A short game for the Extra Credits Holiday Game Jam 2018.

There are downloads for Windows, Mac, and Linux available. Please let me know if there are any issues with the downloads, and I'd also appreciate any feedback on how the game plays.

Credits: Music and SFX were downloaded from freesound.org, font used is Hemi Head, inspiration for the game is from Kirby's Quick Draw, and all graphics were hand-drawn by yours truly.
